block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed LHP Jarrod Washburn on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Ramon Ortiz from Edmonton of the PCL. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Optioned INF Greg Norton to Charlotte of the International League. Recalled RHP Aaron Myette from Charlotte. SEATTLE MARINERS--Claimed C Chris Widger off waivers from the Montreal Expos. Called up RHP Joel Pineiro from Tacoma of the PCL. Placed OF Raul Ibanez on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to Aug. 7. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Sent RHP Pete Munro to the Texas Rangers to complete the trade for OF Dave Martinez.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed LHP Jarrod Washburn on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Ramon Ortiz from Edmonton of the PCL. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Optioned INF Greg Norton to Charlotte of the International League. Recalled RHP Aaron Myette from Charlotte. SEATTLE MARINERS--Claimed C Chris Widger off waivers from the Montreal Expos. Called up RHP Joel Pineiro from Tacoma of the PCL. Placed OF Raul Ibanez on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to Aug. 7. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Sent RHP Pete Munro to the Texas Rangers to complete the trade for OF Dave Martinez.
National League PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Activated RHP Wayne Gomes from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Cliff Politte to Scranton of the International League.
National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Signed F Darius Miles, G Keyon Dooling and G Quentin Richardson. ORLANDO MAGIC--Re-signed C John Amaechi.

National Football League ATLANTA FALCONS--Waived CB Dwayne Stukes and WR Steve Vagedes. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Agreed to terms with CB Mark Roman on a four-year contract. DALLAS COWBOYS--Signed TE Rickey Brady and DB Hurley Tarver. Released RB Chrys Chukwuma, LB Bernard Rusk and TE Brian Roche. DETROIT LIONS--Signed DE Robert Porcher to a four-year contract extension. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed RB Rafael Cooper.
National Hockey League DALLAS STARS--Signed RW Jere Lehtinen to a four-year contract. EDMONTON OILERS--Signed Centre Todd Marchant to a two-year contract.
